name: The Corbin Center
description: Multi-purpose event and technology center located just off Exit 25 in Southern Kentucky, featuring a 19,744 square foot facility where business meets recreation. Hosts business training courses, meetings, conventions, tournaments, weddings, receptions, parties, and live music events. Features multiple classrooms, boardroom, multipurpose room, and showcase 'Glass Room' with audio/video amenities and beverage service available.
source: Verified from official The Corbin Center website and multiple authoritative sources
hours_of_operation: Monday - Friday 8:00 am - 4:30 pm, Saturday and Sunday by appointment
eligibility: Open to all individuals and organizations seeking event space
services: Event venue rental, business training facilities, meeting rooms, convention space, wedding and reception venues, classroom space, audio/video equipment, beverage service, WiFi access
notes: Conveniently located off Exit 25. Can accommodate groups of 30-300 attendees. Features stage, podium, and audio/video amenities as add-on services. On-site parking available. Tours available upon request.
